scripts.pod-install: bundle install && cd ios && bundle exec pod install && cd ..
scripts.android-debug-prod: cd android && ./gradlew clean && cd .. && react-native run-android --mode=prodDebug
scripts.android-release-dev: cd android && ./gradlew clean && rm -rf build && rm -rf android/build && cd .. && react-native run-android --mode=devRelease
scripts.android-release-stg: cd android && ./gradlew clean && rm -rf build && rm -rf android/build && cd .. && react-native run-android --mode=stgRelease
scripts.android-release-prod: cd android && ./gradlew clean && rm -rf build && rm -rf android/build && cd .. && react-native run-android --mode=prodRelease
scripts.android-apk-dev: rm -rf build && rm -rf android/build && export ENVFILE=.env.dev && cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew assembleDevRelease && cd ..
scripts.build-apk-stg: rm -rf build && rm -rf android/build && ENVFILE=.env.stg && cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew assembleStgRelease && cd ..
scripts.build-apk-prod: rm -rf build && rm -rf android/build && ENVFILE=.env.prod && cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew assembleProdRelease && cd ..
scripts.build-aab-stg: rm -rf build && rm -rf android/build && ENVFILE=.env.stg && cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew bundleStgRelease && cd ..
scripts.build-aab-prod: rm -rf build && rm -rf android/build && ENVFILE=.env.prod && cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew bundleProdRelease && cd ..
